0.title: Don't Stop Believin'
0.lyrics: Don't stop believing, hold onto that feeling.

1.title: You Get What You Give
1.lyrics: Don't give up, you've got a reason to live. Can't forget: we only get what we give

2.title: Miracle
2.lyrics: Every day is a miracle (Help one another). Connect back with the people (Give it to your lover), and all the people you miss (Let's come around).

3.title: Counting Stars
3.lyrics: Everything that drowns me makes me want to fly
